timeline.bodyText: why are the admin servers samples a child of the access services samples. I would assume the admin services amples do not call the omas APIs.
timeline.author: davidradl

replies.bodyText: You are correct - a cut/paste typo. thanks for spotting!
replies.author: planetf1

timeline.bodyText: This name does not look right . The name seems to be that of the parent.
timeline.author: davidradl
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,125 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+
+<!-- SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 -->
+<!-- Copyright Contributors to the ODPi Egeria project. -->
+
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+
+    <parent>
+        <artifactId>design-model-archives</artifactId>
+        <groupId>org.odpi.egeria</groupId>
+        <version>1.8-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <scm>
+        <connection>scm:git:git://github.com/odpi/egeria.git</connection>
+        <developerConnection>scm:git:ssh://github.com/odpi/egeria.git</developerConnection>
+        <url>http://github.com/odpi/egeria/tree/master</url>
+    </scm>
+
+    <name>Design Model Archives</name>

replies.bodyText: I wasn't sure what to call it as we didn't have a module before. I've put in a basic name (I made an error in not writing something!) but as owner suggest you review and update in a new issue/PR as needed
replies.author: planetf1

timeline.bodyText: Description is that of the parent
timeline.author: davidradl
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,125 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+
+<!-- SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 -->
+<!-- Copyright Contributors to the ODPi Egeria project. -->
+
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+
+    <parent>
+        <artifactId>design-model-archives</artifactId>
+        <groupId>org.odpi.egeria</groupId>
+        <version>1.8-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <scm>
+        <connection>scm:git:git://github.com/odpi/egeria.git</connection>
+        <developerConnection>scm:git:ssh://github.com/odpi/egeria.git</developerConnection>
+        <url>http://github.com/odpi/egeria/tree/master</url>
+    </scm>
+
+    <name>Design Model Archives</name>
+    <description>
+        The Design Model Archives provide utilities for loading common/standard design models from third parties.
